{{Infobox Berry |name = #60 Liechi |image = [[File:Liechi.png]] |caption = This Berry is surrounded by mystery. It is rumored to be imbued with the power of the sea. |growtime = 2d 0h 0m 0s |harvest = 0.5 berries |replant = 0% |points = 10,000 |flavor =
*30 spicy *10 dry *30 sweet *0 bitter *0 sour }} '''Liechi''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in the [[Farm]]. It can be obtained by having at least one empty plot and at least 23 ripe [[Passho]] on the field. #382 Kyogre must have been caught to unlock this berry. {| class="wikitable" |+ Growth Stage Durations ! Seed !! Sprout !! Taller !! Bloom !! Berry |- | 0-21600s || 21600-43200s || 43200-86400s || 86400-172800s || 172800-345600s |- | [[File:AllTreeSeed.png|50px]] || [[File:AllTreeSprout.png|50px]] || [[File:LiechiTreeTaller.png|50px]] || [[File:LiechiTreeBloom.png|50px]] || [[File:LiechiTreeBerry.png|50px]] |} === Possible Planting Formations === You can fill your [[farm]] in following way to obtain Liechi berry. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Farm |- | style="width: 40px;" | || style="width: 40px;" | [[Passho]] || style="width: 40px;" | [[Passho]] || style="width: 40px;" | [[Passho]] || style="width: 40px;" | [[Passho]] |- | [[Passho]] || [[Passho]] || [[Passho]] || [[Passho]] || [[Passho]] |- style="height: 26px;" | [[Passho]] || [[Passho]] || [[Passho]] || [[Passho]] || [[Passho]] |- | [[Passho]] || [[Passho]] || [[Passho]] || [[Passho]] || [[Passho]] |- | || [[Passho]] || [[Passho]] || [[Passho]] || [[Passho]] |}
